entries.meaning: (golf, dated) A metal-headed golf club with a large highly lofted head. Replaced by a sand iron or wedge in a modern set of clubs.

verbs.description: niblick (third-person singular simple present niblicks, present participle niblicking, simple past and past participle niblicked)

entries.meaning: (golf, transitive, intransitive) To strike, or take a shot, with a niblick.
